title: Map, 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

Japanese insc LRC: [Gihachiro Okuyama]; LRC: [Nihon Hanga Kenkyu
description: color printed map listing the 53 stops along the Tokaido Road in English; road is indicated by red line along shore, while stops are indicated by red circles; some of the stop names are highlighted in pink or green; other important cities and mountains are indicated on the map; inset at ULQ shows a railway map of Japan in English
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
